description:
Sudoku is a puzzle in which you place numbers from 1 to 9 into a 9x9 grid, divided into horizontal and vertical lines and 3x3 blocks, filling up all of the spaces with the numbers. With everything from simple puzzles to super-difficult ones, this game is popular with a wide range of players, from beginners to veterans. Please enjoy this high-quality sudoku game.

The options menu, manual, and other text are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Sudoku
intro:
A huge hit all over the world!
The famous number puzzle "SUDOKU"
has universal appeal!
